attributes.action: introduce compulsory neutering, vaccination and microchipping of pet rabbits at the point of sale, licensing of breeders and for sellers to provide full information about care and costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rabbits are one of the most abused pets in the UK. Neutering and microchipping would prevent breeding of unwanted rabbits and allow abandoned rabbits to be traced to their source or reunited with their owners. Breeding should only be allowed under license. Vaccination against VHD and myxi would prevent many unnecessary deaths. Sellers frequently provide misleading information about costs, accomodation and feed, if any information is given at all. This would save rescue centres millions of pounds which could be better spent. This should be considered for all other pets also.
